name: Tether USD
description: Flow Stable Finance simplifies the use of stablecoins on Flow: acquire USDF, stgUSDC, and USDC.e via exchanges or bridges (Layerzero, Stargate, Celer), swap FLOW and stablecoins on DEXs like KittySwap, deposit into DeFi pools (up to 60% APR), and use Flow/MetaMask wallets for secure operations.
